name: Time Skip
description:
Use creative abilities to explore the facility, traversing new heights learning the reasons why you have been locked away. Solve puzzles to advance through the deadly obstacles trying to discover the truth behind this mystery. Leon has various powers and abilities to solve each puzzle several different ways. This is a challenging & enjoyable First-person puzzle adventure.

This game is a fun and fast-paced first person puzzle challenge game. A brand new indie game created by one single developer. Time Skip uses stunning graphics and creative puzzle mechanics to provide players with a challenging experience.
